name: Bonk Golf
description:
Bonk Golf is a small little project that I put together in just 6 hours! It was a really fun game to work, and so I hope you enjoy it as well! ^^

Just click and drag in the inverse direction of where you want to shoot the ball and... well, I'm sure you know the rules of golf :P

Check out some of my other work, too! :)
